creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: torque made from one hollow ring of thin silver; ring is in the shape of two dragons; dragons' open mouths meet at the center; there is an orb sitting in the middle of their open jaws; the back of the torque is in the crisscrossing of the dragons' tails
title: Torque
